name: Drinking Buddy
text: You and your allies have almost preternatural luck when you’ve all had a few drinks
benefit: Once per day, if you are drunk (or worse) within 10 feet of an ally who has this feat and is also drunk (or worse), you can reroll one d20 roll as a free action. You must take the result of the second roll, even if it is worse.
text_zh: 喝一点酒，你和你的队友能得到一点特别的幸运。
benefit_zh: 每天一次，当你醉酒（或更糟）并与一名同样拥有此专长并同样醉酒（或更糟）的队友位于10尺以内时，你可以以一个自由动作重投一个d20。你必须接受第二次的结果，即使更糟。
